headline: Transaction in Own Shares

headline: Transaction in own shares and Total Voting Rights
summary: OSB GROUP PLC ISIN: GB00BLDRH36001 July 2025 LEI number: 213800ZBKL9BHSL2K459 OSB GROUP PLC (the “Company”) Transaction in Own Shares and Total Voting Rights The Company announces that on 30 June 2025 it had purchased a total of 2,119 of its ordinary shares of £0.01 each (the "ordinary shares") on the London Stock Exchange, CBOE BXE and CBOE CXE, through the Company's broker Citigroup Global Markets Limited as detailed below. The repurchased ordinary shares will be cancelled. London Stock Exchan
